metadata.Title: CVE-2016-1239 on Ubuntu 18.04 ESM (bionic) - low.
metadata.Description:
duck before 0.10 did not properly handle loading of untrusted code from the current directory.

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2016-1239` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

duck - 0.13
No subscription required

criterions.comment: duck package in bionic, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '0.13').
